recipe.ingredients: - raw almonds: 1/2 cup - walnuts: 1/2 cup - dried cranberries (unsweetened): 1/2 cup - pumpkin seeds (shelled): 1/4 cup - dark chocolate chips (at least 70% cacao): 1/4 cup
recipe.directions: 1. Combine Nuts and Seeds: In a large mixing bowl, combine the raw almonds, walnuts, and pumpkin seeds. 2. Add Sweetness: Toss in the dried cranberries and dark chocolate chips to add a touch of sweetness and rich flavor. 3. Mix Well: Stir all the ingredients together until evenly mixed. 4. Portion and Pack: Divide the mixture into individual snack-sized bags or containers for easy on-the-go snacking.
